website_summaries.verdict: Not only is this push-up bra extremely versatile, but most wearers love the comfort and support it provides.
pros: Impresses with its versatility, as this bra can be worn 12 different ways, including as a strapless
Strategically placed silicone keeps it in place while underwire provides supportive lift
Available in black, blush, and nude
cons: Sizes tend to run small, resulting in a tight fit for some
A few customers say the underwire is annoying

customer_reviews.title: Stays up strapless style!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and stays up in strapless style, I've learned through the years if you go down a band size on strapless bras they stay put ! If you have very large breast go down a band size and go up the cup size and it will work as well ! It works for me so figured I'd share.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: It does have a little padding/push up
customer_reviews.text: When I looked at reviews I couldn’t get a clear answer about padding or push up. It fits great and does give a bit of a lift from the padding underneath without looking fake or too busty. I had a Maidenform strapless underwire but without that bit of padding underneath—-it was not flattering. This one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: M & M Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great strapless bra
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying a bra online, and I bought it through the Try Before You Buy just in case. I don’t wear it with straps so that says a lot about how well it holds up. It does have a “sticky” strip across the top of the cups to keep them in place (the kind you normally see on the sides of the bra) so that took some getting used to. It took about 2 weeks of wearing it exclusively to break it in, but it’s comfortable now. I’m definitely buying another, because with my luck, they’ll stop making something as soon as I find something that fits right.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking to buy a strapless bra that actually fits without slopping down. This is the perfect bra just what I wanted. I ordered 32B one size smaller to what I normally wear and it fits perfect. My only concern is about the packaging which was very bad,without protection which gave some denting on the padding,but I am keeping it as I like it very much. Hope they concentrate on their packaging when they have such good product.
customer_reviews.author: Fabi

customer_reviews.title: Fits a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Fits a bit small in the cup whereas other Maidenform bras of same size fit well. Makes it dig in on both sides for mild discomfort- works well as a strapless, as long as you fill the cup, if not, it sticks out, but that's any strapless bra. Like the variability of wear with the detachable straps.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: The most perfect Strapless Bra snd had straps too.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect strapless bra! The very best I have ever purchased. Perfect fit#
customer_reviews.author: suzie c

customer_reviews.title: Size up!
customer_reviews.text: I should have sized up it’s pretty small and not the best quality but it does the job
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fits as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent strapless bra! I normally wear the Love the Lift bras, and love the fit, comfort, and material! I wear a 34b and it fit as expected. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ggamazon123

customer_reviews.title: Nice bra
customer_reviews.text: Love this bra. Lifts just the right amount to stay comfortable all day.
customer_reviews.author: Mama bear

customer_reviews.title: It fits as expected and seems like it will stay in place wearing it strapless
customer_reviews.text: I literally received this bra the next day after ordering. It fits as expected and seems like it will stay in place wearing it strapless. Great quality too!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole K.

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The underwiring and material of this bra is very stiff. I feel like I can’t move around in it and it also makes my breasts look really small since the cups are smaller than most bras.
customer_reviews.author: turtlelips7635

customer_reviews.title: Band was extremely tight, cups were fine, disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The band was too tight. Ended up having to go plan b, without. Possible not desirable, which is a shame because due to the chaos in America, bra return wasn't at the top of my brain. Now it's too late. For other shoppers, this was a 34C my daughter is a 33C. Cups fit fine, band strained hard on last hook. Shame because quality is lovely, very soft and pretty and has straps for different looks. Would have loved to have it on hand for the special occasions it might be needed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Mattson

customer_reviews.title: Way too tight
customer_reviews.text: Bought my usual size, but the band seemed tighter than normal even on the widest clip. Left marks around my chest. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Maidenform Women's Love The Lift Push-up & in Strapless Bra Bra
product_meta.description: The Maidenform push-up and in strapless bra will be the most versitle piece in your wardrobe, with convertible straps providing 12 different ways to wear and a banded frame with all-around silicone strip making sure the bra stays put.
feature_bullets: Removable adjustable straps that convert to 12 ways to wear
Banded frame, designed for a comfortable, secure fit
3 hook and eyes for added support
